title: Aquarium
description: Naoko has been turned down by the prestigious high school she wanted to attend, and in her disappointment she turns to the aquarium, where the glittering water and flashing bodies of the ocean creatures allow her to forget for a time the difficulties of life. In this moving coming-of-age story by Tomoko Taniguchi, one of Japan's finest graphic novel authors, she learns to accept the joys and beauties of love and to treasure her family and her friends.
author: Tomoko Taniguchi
